name: Cray Cray Blocks
description:
Update 13/12/2015: Fixed some minor bugs with the invisible blocks.

Cray Cray Blocks is a fun and addictive physics arcade game. Your goal is to destroy all the blocks to progress. My goal was to make this game challenging by developing blocks with a twist. Some blocks are spiky and need to be hit from behind. Other blocks move, trying to throw you off-guard. Some blocks may be invisible. My personal favorites are the gravity blocks that increase the gravity to the point where your ball just bounces around.

Can you beat this game?

Disclaimer: The game is currently in full playable Alpha. It has been play tested and major bugs have been taken care of. I am currently moving into Beta and will appreciate any feedback or bug reports.
